sku.Description: The policy sku. This property is optional, obsolete, and will be ignored.

location.Description: The location of the policy assignment. Only required when utilizing managed identity.

identity.Description: The managed identity associated with the policy assignment.

displayName.Description: The display name of the policy assignment.

policyDefinitionId.Description: The ID of the policy definition or policy set definition being assigned.

scope.Description: The scope for the policy assignment.

parameters.Description: The parameter values for the assigned policy rule. The keys are the parameter names.

description.Description: This message will be part of response in case of policy violation.

metadata.Description: The policy assignment metadata. Metadata is an open ended object and is typically a collection of key value pairs.

enforcementMode.Description: The policy assignment enforcement mode. Possible values are Default and DoNotEnforce.

name.Description: The name of the policy sku. Possible values are A0 and A1.

tier.Description: The policy sku tier. Possible values are Free and Standard.

principalId.Description: The principal ID of the resource identity.

tenantId.Description: The tenant ID of the resource identity.

type.Description: The identity type. This is the only required field when adding a system assigned identity to a resource.

policyType.Description: The type of policy definition. Possible values are NotSpecified, BuiltIn, Custom, and Static.

mode.Description: The policy definition mode. Some examples are All, Indexed, Microsoft.KeyVault.Data.

displayName.Description: The display name of the policy definition.

metadata.Description: The policy definition metadata.  Metadata is an open ended object and is typically a collection of key value pairs.

parameters.Description: The parameter definitions for parameters used in the policy rule. The keys are the parameter names.

type.Description: The data type of the parameter.

allowedValues.Description: The allowed values for the parameter.

defaultValue.Description: The default value for the parameter if no value is provided.

displayName.Description: The display name for the parameter.

policyType.Description: The type of policy definition. Possible values are NotSpecified, BuiltIn, Custom, and Static.

displayName.Description: The display name of the policy set definition.

metadata.Description: The policy set definition metadata.  Metadata is an open ended object and is typically a collection of key value pairs.

parameters.Description: The policy set definition parameters that can be used in policy definition references.

policyDefinitions.Description: An array of policy definition references.

policyDefinitionGroups.Description: The metadata describing groups of policy definition references within the policy set definition.

policyDefinitionId.Description: The ID of the policy definition or policy set definition.

parameters.Description: The parameter values for the referenced policy rule. The keys are the parameter names.

policyDefinitionReferenceId.Description: A unique id (within the policy set definition) for this policy definition reference.

groupNames.Description: The name of the groups that this policy definition reference belongs to.

additionalMetadataId.Description: A resource ID of a resource that contains additional metadata about the group.
